org.jemmy.input

Class DefaultCharBindingMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jemmy.input.DefaultCharBindingMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharBindingMap<Keyboard.KeyboardButton,Keyboard.KeyboardModifier>

    public class DefaultCharBindingMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements CharBindingMap<Keyboard.KeyboardButton,Keyboard.KeyboardModifier>
    Default implementation of CharBindingMap interface. Provides a mapping for the following symbols:
    Author:
    Alexandre Iline (alexandre.iline@sun.com)
    See Also:
    org.jemmy.CharBindingMap
